snippet: The plan was hatched by executives at the brokerage firm in early October as a road map to survival in the worst-case scenario: What if ratings agencies downgraded MF Global to junk status?
abstract: The plan was hatched by executives at the brokerage firm in early October as a road map to survival in the worst-case scenario: What if ratings agencies downgraded MF Global to junk status?
lead_paragraph: Sifting through the MF Global's "break the glass" plan is a bit like retracing the failed escape route in a charred building.

headline.main: Before Collapse, MF Global Had Emergency Plan
